
// Riccati

!! u(x) = x / 2
Y0 = 0.1 ; T0 = 0 ; h = 0.05 ; N = 30
!! f(Tn,Yn) = Yn^2 + Tn * u(Tn) * Yn + u(Tn)
Y = (0.1, 0.10113171857626335, 0.10354424073431215, 0.10726542307837783, 0.11232678123700574, 0.11876514779425473, 0.12662446126207821, 0.1359577239358084, 0.14682917975976403, 0.15931677951018194, 0.1735150208399999, 0.18953827665792933, 0.20752475923532693, 0.22764131262151488, 0.250089287107206, 0.2751118334633071, 0.303003071635968, 0.3341197537209428, 0.36889627761184174, 0.40786425183380254, 0.45167832094096894, 0.5011507269701952, 0.5572982587771222, 0.6214070869571133, 0.6951239492603989, 0.7805870513163335, 0.8806183876003942, 0.999013878270224, 1.1409946276569765, 1.3139341820639356, 1.5285808552014561)
